description: A few weeks ago, I realized I had no idea about one of the most basic aspects of my own body – *my blood type*. Sure, my parents or some computer database at my doctor’s office probably had it written down, but there was something about not knowing myself that bothered me. So I decided to take to the internet and end this question once and for all.
blurb: How to interpret the blood type alphabet soup.
title: Who came up with blood types and what do they mean?
